title: Wavelet-based Variational Autoencoders for High-Resolution Image Generation
abstract: Variational Autoencoders (VAEs) are powerful generative models capable of learning compact latent representations. However, conventional VAEs often generate relatively blurry images due to their assumption of an isotropic Gaussian …
